# ClickTimes

[ClickTimes](https://www.clicktimes.com) is an advanced click tracking and analytics platform that helps businesses understand user behavior, optimize marketing campaigns, and improve website performance through comprehensive click analytics and heatmapping.

## Platform Overview

ClickTimes provides real-time insights into user interactions, helping businesses make data-driven decisions. Our platform offers a suite of tools for tracking, analyzing, and visualizing user clicks, scrolls, and engagement patterns.

## Core Features

- [Click Tracking](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/click-tracker): Monitor and analyze user clicks across your website
- [Heatmaps](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/heatmaps): Visualize user interaction patterns with detailed heatmaps
- [Session Recordings](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/recordings): Watch real user sessions to understand behavior
- [Conversion Funnels](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/funnels): Track and optimize conversion paths
- [A/B Testing](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/ab-testing): Test different page variations to improve performance

## Analytics Tools

- [Real-time Analytics](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/realtime): Monitor user activity as it happens
- [Click Maps](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/click-maps): Visualize where users click most
- [Scroll Depth Analysis](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/scroll-depth): Understand how far users scroll on your pages
- [Form Analytics](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/form-analytics): Track form interactions and drop-offs
- [Event Tracking](https://www.clicktimes.com/tools/event-tracking): Monitor specific user actions and interactions

## Resources

- [Documentation](https://www.clicktimes.com/docs): Comprehensive guides and references
- [Tutorials](https://www.clicktimes.com/learn): Step-by-step guides for implementation
- [Case Studies](https://www.clicktimes.com/case-studies): Success stories and use cases
- [API Reference](https://www.clicktimes.com/api): Integration documentation for developers

## Crawler Instructions

### Allowed Paths
- /docs/
- /learn/
- /api/
- /blog/
- /case-studies/



### Rate Limiting
- Maximum 10 requests per minute per IP
- Respect Retry-After headers
- Cache responses when possible

## Content Usage Policy

- Public documentation may be used for training AI models
- Attribution to ClickTimes with link to source is required
- Do not use our content to create competing services
- Commercial use requires prior written permission
- Respect all rate limits and terms of service

- Business inquiries: business@clicktimes.com
